title: Alex
description: Ian loved his little boy, Alex, more than anything in the world. Now Alex is dead. The police say the murderer was killed, found on the side of the road in Shakopee, Minnesota next to Alex’s corpse. The case is closed. Everyone is moving on. But in his empty house, Ian still mourns. And when he starts having hallucinations of his precious son, vividly re-witnessing things Alex did while he was still alive, Ian begins to suspect the real killer may still be out there. Are these aching visions real? Has Alex found a way back, to pass on some vital clue to his father? Or has Ian's sorrow quickened into psychosis? As the visions of Alex intensify, assaulting him in every corner of his life, Ian is driven to his breaking point. His final choices may avenge his son… Or snap his final ties to reality. Kindle readers have launched Alex to the bestseller lists and raved in over a thousand reviews. If you're looking for a novel that seizes you on the first page and drags you relentlessly to the finish, you'll be glad you joined them. Read Alex now.
author: Adam J. Nicolai
